  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminKeys
    Admin preference settings keys.
    AdminPasswordDialogFragment  
    AdminPreferencesActivity
    Handles admin preferences, which are password-protectable and govern which app features and general preferences the end user of the app will be able to see.
    AdminPreferencesFragment

    AdminPreferencesFragment.MainMenuAccessPreferences

    CaptionedListPreference
    A ListPreference where each item has a caption and the entire dialog also has a caption.
    CaptionedListPreference.Item  
    ChangeAdminPasswordDialog  
    CustomServerPathsFragment  
    ExperimentalPreferencesFragment  
    ExtendedCheckboxPreference
    A Checkbox preference that allows the title to have the disabled look when the dependency it references gets disabled.
    ExtendedEditTextPreference
    Custom EditTextPreference that allows the title and summary to be "greyed out"/disabled in its entirety.
    ExtendedPreferenceCategory
    Custom PreferenceCategory that allows the titleto be "greyed out"/disabled in its entirety.
